m76hR3daffVoYn1L6.name: Sympathy
m76hR3daffVoYn1L6.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP

mD8C-L98c34VCdffN.name: Sympathy
mD8C-L98c34VCdffN.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP and wounds affect ally but not you

mHeNTkgsp8R1hJ3K9.name: Sympathy
mHeNTkgsp8R1hJ3K9.notes: Death of one party kills the other

mtdupLbVadGngPgHX.name: Sympathy
mtdupLbVadGngPgHX.notes: Death of one party kills the other and wounds affect ally but not you

features.situation: from sapient being with whom you actively interact (converse, lecture, etc.)
to Influence rolls

mdeZfj1PqAqDJ7eQl.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

mjR4WeSS_Y8rXoOk1.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

features.situation: from others in social situations when you have a chance to plan your attire in advance
to someone else's reaction bonus from others when you put together their outfit

tIFTZG26iGQUXNEfl.name: Luck
tIFTZG26iGQUXNEfl.notes: Usable once per hour of play

mYyAr3hriIYjYJee4.name: @Who: Individual with 150% of PC's starting points@

m8kyCIlkmV0Ghlvvi.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 1000 times starting wealth@

mnsQ9VyPilMPXiRqO.name: @Who: Individual with twice the PC's starting points@

m1UmVqkCFKaBZMS3j.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 10000 times starting wealth@

mx7ZL7FOMyl9gkYyS.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 100000 times starting wealth@

m17YfvIFm4dzNtthL.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 1000000 times starting wealth@

mRaKEMLeNCRpL2EWD.name: @Who: A national government or giant multi-national organization@

m5PVNgoMJT-Rn6MpO.name: Equipment
m5PVNgoMJT-Rn6MpO.notes: @Equipment worth no more than average starting wealth@

mjB6hAVr9hjh0XUge.name: Equipment
mjB6hAVr9hjh0XUge.notes: @Equipment worth more than average starting wealth@

mNyR1IDvL9GT_HYve.name: Special Abilities
mNyR1IDvL9GT_HYve.notes: @Magical powers in a non-magical world, higher TL equipment, grants special powers or is supernatural@

mLTWe3-nVPAt_0gqg.name: People Affected
mLTWe3-nVPAt_0gqg.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@

features.situation: from business partners

mOssha-Riu0e-xHeB.name: Alternate Benefit
mOssha-Riu0e-xHeB.notes: Bonus to resist deception involving numbers

features.situation: from engineers and scientists
from con artists, politicians, salesmen, etc. – but only if you aren’t trying to manipulate them.

t8lvy_XEsM82lRwjY.name: Acrophobia (Heights)
t8lvy_XEsM82lRwjY.notes: You may not voluntarily go more than 15 feet above ground, unless you are inside a building and away from windows. If there is some chance of an actual fall, self-control rolls are at -5.

tBBtEFqnL__zEwUdq.name: Agoraphobia (Open Spaces)
tBBtEFqnL__zEwUdq.notes: You are uncomfortable whenever you are outside, and actually become frightened when there are no walls within 50 feet.

t90I9yGvopfDXgrDr.name: Aichmophobia/TL6+ (Sharp Things)
t90I9yGvopfDXgrDr.notes: You are afraid of anything pointed. Swords, spears, knives, and needles all give you fits. Trying to use a sharp weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

t2s_ngjPP42Xg7olD.name: Ailurophobia (Cats)
t2s_ngjPP42Xg7olD.notes: This includes all felines: lions, tigers, panthers, etc.

tig9J7Ze8fE-TCL0L.name: Autophobia (Being Alone)
tig9J7Ze8fE-TCL0L.notes: You cannot stand to be alone, and do anything in your power to avoid it.

tRKa1TzxytGCPLk2n.name: Brontophobia (Loud Noises)
tRKa1TzxytGCPLk2n.notes: You avoid any situation where loud noises are likely. A sudden loud noise requires an immediate self-control roll. A thunderstorm is a traumatic experience for you!

features.situation: from others
from past victims and anyone with Empathy
to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture

tVr8t4uBSgZExc6iB.name: Claustrophobia (Enclosed Spaces)
tVr8t4uBSgZExc6iB.notes: You are uncomfortable any time you can’t see the sky – or at least a very high ceiling. In a small room or vehicle, you feel the walls closing in on you... You need air! This is a dangerous fear for someone who plans to go underground.

tmt6l7tatAKk-MYld.name: Code of Honor (Professional)
tmt6l7tatAKk-MYld.notes: Adhere to the ethics of your profession; always do your job to the best of your ability; support your guild, union, or professional association.

t_x5VdvkGm5T36uiz.name: Coitophobia (Sex)
t_x5VdvkGm5T36uiz.notes: You are terrified by the idea of sexual relations or the loss of your virginity.

features.situation: from like-minded extroverts
or worse from sober-minded citizens (GM discretion)
from pious folk

t0luSfV7XDFYsPRb4.name: Cynophobia (Dogs)
t0luSfV7XDFYsPRb4.notes: This includes all canines: foxes, wolves, coyotes, wild dogs, etc.

tchiHlQ_CjgYp2EPS.name: Demophobia (Crowds)
tchiHlQ_CjgYp2EPS.notes: Any group of over a dozen people sets off this fear unless they are all well known to you. The self-control roll is at -1 for over 25 people, -2 for a crowd of 100 or more, -3 for 1,000, -4 for 10,000, and so on.

tkM8_zAGbpAfn11xo.name: Entomophobia (Insects)
tkM8_zAGbpAfn11xo.notes: You are afraid of all “bugs.” Large or poisonous ones give -3 to self-control rolls. Very large ones, or large numbers, give -6. Avoid hills of giant ants.

tXtCniy1KC9OeiGoL.name: Gluttony
tXtCniy1KC9OeiGoL.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with a tempting morsel or good wine that, for some reason, you should resist. If you fail, you partake – regardless of the consequences.

tFXBlm9hd3pNSUaSr.name: Greed
tFXBlm9hd3pNSUaSr.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered – as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.

toQj8npHP7GZLqUQS.name: Hemophobia (Blood)
toQj8npHP7GZLqUQS.notes: The sight of blood gives you the screaming willies! You need to make a self-control roll during most combats...

t9LIetrV8vZTuEMeh.name: Herpetophobia (Reptiles)
t9LIetrV8vZTuEMeh.notes: You come unglued at the thought of reptiles, amphibians, and similar scaly slimies. A very large reptile, or a poisonous one, gives -2 to self-control rolls; a horde of reptiles (such as a snake pit) gives -4.

tjWlTa0Nk-QzR6DBt.name: Hoplophobia (Weapons)
tjWlTa0Nk-QzR6DBt.notes: The presence of any sort of weaponry is stressful. Trying to use a weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

features.situation: toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)

tHo5LVK_VL9agHmrm.name: Low Pain Threshold
tHo5LVK_VL9agHmrm.notes: Double the shock from any injury. Whenever you take a wound that does more than 1 HP of damage, you must make a Will roll to avoid crying out.

features.situation: from "macho" individuals
to resist knockdown, stunning, and physical torture

tJ0dvZ-iErCO1-Uhr.name: Manaphobia (Magic)
tJ0dvZ-iErCO1-Uhr.notes: You can never learn to use magic, and you react badly to any user of magic. Make a self-control roll whenever you are in the presence of magic. This roll is at -3 if you are to be the target of friendly magic, and -6 if you are the target of hostile magic. (The magic does not have to be real, if you believe in it!)

tdxmMyePUp3BMWgE-.name: Miserliness
tdxmMyePUp3BMWgE-.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you are called on to spend money. If the expenditure is large, this roll may be at -5 or worse (GM’s decision). If you fail, you refuse to spend the money.

tDHtvcEWNYpDqCfRB.name: Mysophobia (Dirt)
tDHtvcEWNYpDqCfRB.notes: You are deathly afraid of infection, or just of dirt and filth. Make a self-control roll when you must do something that might get you dirty. Roll at -5 to eat any unaccustomed food. You should act as “finicky” as possible.

t89H9ViVLt-1V4Ziu.name: Necrophobia (Death)
t89H9ViVLt-1V4Ziu.notes: You are terrified by the idea of death. Make a self-control roll in the presence of any dead body (animals don’t count, but portions of human bodies do). Roll at -4 if the body is that of someone you know, or -6 if the body is unnaturally animated in some way. A ghost (or apparent ghost) also requires a roll at -6.

twV5c8jetuhTH2lfz.name: Obsession
twV5c8jetuhTH2lfz.notes: varies; Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

tO69SkNFNRFau1MoX.name: Overconfidence
tO69SkNFNRFau1MoX.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are
from experienced NPCs

tylUJ4Q798jcsF95Y.name: Post-Combat Shakes
tylUJ4Q798jcsF95Y.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

tgM9DzqULHHF5aQB5.name: Pyrophobia (Fire)
tgM9DzqULHHF5aQB5.notes: Even a burning cigarette bothers you if it comes within five yards.

ma3RXMPuW_3iBfi9z.name: People Affected
ma3RXMPuW_3iBfi9z.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@

tJaSM9piTEIzO06MT.name: Scotophobia (Darkness)
tJaSM9piTEIzO06MT.notes: A common fear, but crippling. You should avoid being underground if possible; if something happens to your flashlight or torch, you might well lose your mind before you can relight it.

tzW9YICRfpaOafzFN.name: Selfish
tzW9YICRfpaOafzFN.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces
from others

t9eH5-ceryMalB4nP.name: Teratophobia (Monsters)
t9eH5-ceryMalB4nP.notes: Any “unnatural” creature sets off this fear. You have -1 to -4 on the self-control roll if the monster seems very large or dangerous, or if there are a lot of them. Note that the definition of “monster” depends on experience. An American Indian would consider an elephant monstrous, while an African pygmy would not!

tG21EGO_tFusAF2mk.name: Thalassophobia (Oceans)
tG21EGO_tFusAF2mk.notes: You are afraid of any large body of water. Ocean travel, or even air travel over the ocean, is basically impossible for you, and encounters with aquatic monsters are also upsetting.

t5w6-M9LhP_tCnwi7.name: Triskaidekaphobia (Number 13)
t5w6-M9LhP_tCnwi7.notes: You must make a self-control roll whenever you have to deal with the number 13. Roll at -5 if Friday the 13th is involved!

t_I23W7LpDHhK87Bw.name: Unfit
t_I23W7LpDHhK87Bw.notes: You lose FP at twice the normal rate

features.situation: to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc

tVmaWrFY0qwZ5QPea.name: Unluckiness
tVmaWrFY0qwZ5QPea.notes: Once per play session, the GM will arbitrarily and maliciously make something go wrong for you.

t9kzAHMRoppjMEDL5.name: Very Unfit
t9kzAHMRoppjMEDL5.notes: You lose FP at twice the normal rate and recover FP at only half the normal rate

features.situation: -2 to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc.

tz_hBdG7DTEHyY1b4.name: Xenophobia (Strange and Unknown Things)
tz_hBdG7DTEHyY1b4.notes: You are upset by any sort of strange circumstances, and in particular by strange people. Make a self-control roll when surrounded by people of another race or nationality; roll at -3 if the people are not human. If you lose control, you might well attack strangers out of fear.

SlohsuJHQeXvcG6At.name: Spend 4 extra points in primary or secondary skills
